type Rss20FeedFormatter = class inherit SyndicationFeedFormatter interface IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 此類別可將 執行個體序列化為 RSS 2.0 格式，或自 RSS 2.0 序列化為原來的執行個體。

span.span: A class that serializes a instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此類別即可序列化 的執行個體，並且從表示 RSS 2.0 摘要的 XML 文件建立 的執行個體。Use this class to serialize instances of and to create instances of from XML documents that represent RSS 2.0 feeds. 若您自 衍生類別並且想要將它序列化，請使用 格式器。If you have derived a class from and want to serialize it, use the formatter. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何建立 ，並將其序列化為 RSS 2.0。The following code shows how to create a and serialize it to RSS 2.0. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` 參數為 `true`，則會使用 Atom 1.0 命名空間序列化在 Atom 1.0 規格中已定義、但是在 RSS 2.0 規格中未定義的所有項目。If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with in the Atom 1.0 namespace. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following example shows how to call this constructor. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreserveAttributeExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreserveAttributeExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，這個值會指定序列化期間是否保留屬性延伸。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

value.span: 指定序列化期間是否保留屬性延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 屬性延伸是指 RSS 2.0 規格中未定義的 XML 屬性。Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification. 這個屬性 (Property) 會判斷序列化期間是否寫入這些屬性 (Attribute)。This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization. 同樣地，此屬性 (Property) 會決定在還原序列化 RSS 2.0 摘要時，`AttributeExtensions` 執行個體中的 屬性 (Property) 是否要保留未知的屬性 (Attribute)。Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreserveElementExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreserveElementExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，這個值會指定序列化期間是否保留項目延伸。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.

value.span: 指定序列化期間是否保留項目延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 項目延伸是指 RSS 2.0 規格中未定義的 XML 項目。Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification. 這個屬性會判斷序列化期間是否寫入這些項目。This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization. 同樣地，此屬性會決定在還原序列化 RSS 2.0 摘要時，`ElementExtensions` 執行個體中的 屬性是否要保留未知的項目。Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SerializeExtensionsAsAtom { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SerializeExtensionsAsAtom : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定是否要在 Atom 1.0 命名空間中序列化延伸模組。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.

value.span: 指定是否在 Atom 1.0 命名空間中序列化延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this property is `true`. 當此屬性為 `true` 時， 類別中無法以 RSS 2.0 格式表示的任何屬性，將在 Atom 1.0 命名空間內序列化，否則就不會序列化這些屬性。When this property is `true`, any properties in the class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace otherwise these properties are not serialized.
